description: Four fifteen minute programs which follow Anna, Nick and skeleton Clive as they set up a toy shop and in the process learn to cope with the minefield of choices and responsibilities facing young consumers. An engaging and humourous story unfolds to assist 7-10 year olds in learning about consumer expectations, advertising, budgeting and consumer rights and responsibilities.
